headline: Constellation Brands (STZ): Valuation in Focus After Earnings Outlook Cut and Analyst Downgrades
summary: If you’re weighing what to do with Constellation Brands (STZ) after this week's headlines, you’re not alone. The company just slashed its fiscal 2026 outlook, warning that both earnings and sales will likely take a bigger hit than it previously expected. Management laid the blame on a tough economic backdrop and softer-than-anticipated demand, especially among Hispanic consumers who represent a major chunk of its beer business. The move spooked the market, as a wave of analyst downgrades and...
